description:
Like zombies rising from the grave, many long-rejected oil pipeline projects like Energy East are suddenly being promoted as national necessities in response to U.S. President Donald Trump’s musings about annexing Canada.  To be clear, most Canadians agree that Canada needs to take Trump’s threats seriously and accelerate long-overdue efforts to make our country less […]

The post Trump and the Energy East Pipeline Revival: Why Canada Shouldn’t Waste Billions appeared first on DeSmog.
title: Trump and the Energy East Pipeline Revival: Why Canada Shouldn’t Waste Billions

description:
As tens of millions of Germans head to the polls this Sunday (February 23), one topic has been conspicuously absent from the headlines. In the wake of the hottest year on record – both in Germany and the world – the word “climate” has barely featured on election posters plastering the streets, and has been […]

The post Anti-Climate Attacks Heat Up Before Critical German Elections appeared first on DeSmog.
title: Anti-Climate Attacks Heat Up Before Critical German Elections

description:
Bajo un cielo tropical que amenaza con tormentas y, en medio de advertencias cada vez más serias sobre el precario estado de los ecosistemas del planeta, la Conferencia de las Naciones Unidas sobre Biodiversidad se realiza en Colombia. La cumbre de este año, conocida como COP16, es la continuación de la que fue celebrada en […]

The post Mapa: Cómo las grandes empresas agrícolas, farmacéuticas, de pesticidas y otras esperan influir en las conferencias sobre biodiversidad de la ONU appeared first on DeSmog.
title: Mapa: Cómo las grandes empresas agrícolas, farmacéuticas, de pesticidas y otras esperan influir en las conferencias sobre biodiversidad de la ONU

description:

title: Who is Importing Donald Trump’s Anti-Climate Agenda to Germany?
